message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM 

The paper deals with the problem of novel view synthesis from a single image, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV). The approach proposed in the paper involves approximating a real-world scene by a fixed number of planes and learning to predict homographies and region masks to transform the input image into a novel view, which involves geometric reasoning (cs.GR). The method is based on a deep learning approach, which involves training a network to perform multiple tasks, which is a common topic in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper presents results on two datasets, which involves evaluating the performance of the method on images and videos, which is a common topic in multimedia (cs.MM).
